qas.question: In what year was the Centre Georges Pompidou erected?
What did Valery Giscard d'Estaing have erected?
How many years was Francois Mitterrand in power?
What did Jacques Chirac have built?
In what year was the Musee de quai Branly built?

context: Most of the postwar's presidents of the Fifth Republic wanted to leave their own monuments in Paris; President Georges Pompidou started the Centre Georges Pompidou (<a0_0>1977<a0_0/>), Valéry Giscard d'Estaing began the <a1_0>Musée d'Orsay<a1_0/> (1986); President François Mitterrand, in power for <a2_0>14<a2_0/> years, built the Opéra Bastille (1985-1989), the Bibliothèque nationale de France (1996), the Arche de la Défense (1985-1989), and the Louvre Pyramid with its underground courtyard (1983-1989); Jacques Chirac (<a4_0>2006<a4_0/>), the <a3_0>Musée du quai Branly<a3_0/>.
